summary: Provides an embedded Go‑based online feature service that runs inside the Python process, handling server startup, gRPC/HTTP request handling for real‑time feature retrieval, and converting data between Feast protobuf messages, Apache Arrow structures, and internal Feast types. Includes utilities for mapping Arrow data types to protobuf value fields and translating Arrow arrays into protobuf representations.
business_intent: Enable low‑latency, real‑time access to feature values from a Feast feature store within Python applications by embedding a Go server and handling necessary data format conversions.
